description: Cloud save/load system with 5 slots per user via Supabase. Users can manually save and load game state, with metadata showing team, season, week, and last saved date.
goal: Persist game state to Supabase so progress persists across devices and sessions
requirements: Manual save and load buttons in UI
Save metadata display (team, season, week, last saved)
Wire existing auth UI to Supabase
Collect state from all Zustand stores (GM Points, Equipment, Prestige, Scouting, Career Stats)
constraints: Must wire existing auth UI components to Supabase auth functions
Use existing Zustand stores as data source
Implement Supabase RLS for user data isolation
